entry.content:
Hello everyone, and a massive, warm welcome to my brand new website!
I'm Poppy, and I'm absolutely thrilled to embark on this incredible journey as a new author. For as long as I can remember, I've been passionate about reading, writing and creating new worlds for people to get lost in!
Big news! My debut novel, 'Heart Of The Ormran Warrior' a spicy adult Sci-Fi romance packed with adventure is launching on January 1st, 2026! I'm absolutely buzzing with excitement to share it with you!
Over the coming weeks and months, I plan to share:

  • The Journey to Publication: I'll be sharing behind-the-scenes glimpses of the writing and editing process.
  • Sneak Peeks & Teasers: Get early hints about the story, characters, and world of my upcoming book.
  • Cover Reveal Countdown: Be among the first to see the cover!
  • Launch Updates & Pre-order Info: All the details as we get closer to the big day.
  • Bookish Chats & Inspirations: Let's talk about our favourite reads, writing, and everything that sparks creativity!

I truly believe that stories connect us, and I can't wait to connect with all of you. This is the very beginning, and I'd be honoured to have you join me on this adventure.

Let the countdown begin!
Warmly,
Poppy
